title: Council Decision of 20 January 1997 appointing a member of the Advisory Committee on Pharmaceutical Training (97/C 36/06)
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 20 January 1997 appointing a member of the Advisory Committee on Pharmaceutical Training (97/C 36/06)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to Council Decision 85/434/EEC of 16 September 1985, setting up an Advisory Committee on Pharmaceutical Training (1), and in particular Articles 3 and 4 thereof,
Whereas by Decision of 23 July 1996 (2) the Council appointed Ms Kirsten PERMIN a member for the period ending on 22 July 1999;
Whereas the Danish Government has nominated Ms Karina STAVNSBJERG to replace Ms Kirsten PERMIN,
main_body: Ms Karina STAVNSBJERG is hereby appointed a member of the Advisory Committee on Pharmaceutical Training in place of Ms Kirsten PERMIN for the remainder of the latter's term of office, which expires on 22 July 1999.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 January 1997.
For the Council
The President
J. VAN AARTSEN
(1) OJ No L 253, 24. 9. 1985, p. 43.
(2) OJ No C 239, 17. 8. 1996, p. 5.
